ace.files

Class BufferedTextFileAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ace.Ace
      • ace.files.FileAppender
        • ace.files.BufferedTextFileAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reseteable, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class BufferedTextFileAppender
extends FileAppender
    Useful buffered text file writer class.

      • getAppendix

        public java.lang.String getAppendix()
        Gets the appendix for each single append operation. Specially useful for line feeds and alike line suffixes. If it is null it won't be used.
        Returns:
        the appendix

      • setAppendix

        public BufferedTextFileAppender setAppendix(java.lang.String value)

        Returns:
        itself
